messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Um, yes, I'm on North Rice Avenue. There's a man shooting!
Can you tell if there's anybody injured? We have the fire department and officers en route.
No, he didn't shoot my grandma's house.
Okay, the fire department is en route.
Hello, hello. He's coming immediately.
Who is in your house, ma'am?
We're two houses down.
Is he at your house right now?
Yes, he's shooting! What's your address?
Ma'am, ma'am, I need to know your address.
It's 1129 Oak Street.
Ma'am, stay on the phone with me. Do not hang up, okay?
He's outside and my mom's house is on fire.
Ma'am, take a deep breath, okay? Officers are outside.
Is he still shooting?
Is he still shooting?
No, he was.
The officers are there and the fire department is en route.
I can't recognize him but I have a feeling I know who it is.
Who do you think it is?
His name is Bruce.
Who is he to you?
He's my ex-brother-in-law. They're going through a distress right now.
Is he still there?
My house is on fire. My mom's house is on fire.
The fire department is there. Who is in the house?
Send an ambulance!
They're there, ma'am. Who is all inside the house that's on fire?
1141 is my address. Some of my family is here.
Okay, 1141. Hold on one second.
Some of my family is doing...
The officers are there, okay? They are trying to get to you.
My daughter is here. She's been shot in the face.
The officers and paramedics are almost there. Stay on the phone with me.
I don't know who else is alive.
You're doing great. The officers are just making sure it's safe to enter.
My wife and family...it's pretty deep.
Okay. The officers are there. They're trying to get to you.
My younger five-year-old is here.
The officers are right outside. Hold on.
My name is Leticia.
Okay, Leticia. An officer named Sergeant Eddings is coming to your house right now.
Please send Sergeant upstairs. I don't know where my son is.
Hold on one second, Leticia. You're doing very well.
I can't keep it together.
I know, I know. You're doing perfect. It's going to be okay.
Please, I hope it's positive. I want my family to be safe.
The officers will help your family. Just stay on the phone with me.
Can I give her some water? She's in pain.
Just wait. The officers and paramedics will be there soon.
What is he wearing? He changed his clothes from a Santa Claus suit.
What is he wearing now?
All black. He's knocking on neighbor's doors.
Hold on. Lock all your doors. Do not let him in.
He came in with a shotgun. We all started panicking and running.
Who else is in the house with you?
My two daughters, my husband, my nephews, nieces, and my nephew's girlfriend.
Okay, that's about 15 people. The officers are there making sure it's safe to enter.
My daughter was shot in the face. She's bleeding.
I let the officers know. Just stay on the phone with me.
I'm at 1141. Please hurry.
1141, hold on one second. They're almost there.
My daughter is in pain. Can I give her Motrin?
No, wait for the paramedics to arrive. You're doing great.
Thank you. Please hurry.
They're on their way. Stay on the phone.
Can she have some water?
Hold on one second. Let me check.
Hello, I'm still here. The officers are almost to you.
Can we put her head up? She's losing a lot of blood.
Yes, get her a pillow. Keep her head elevated.
Okay, thank you. She's in a lot of pain.
You're doing great. Just keep talking to me.
My daughter is bleeding heavily.
The paramedics are on their way. Hold on a little longer.
What's going on outside? I see lights.
The officers are there. Just keep calm and stay with me.
I need to know what's happening.
I understand. The officers are ensuring everything is safe.
Okay, thank you. Please hurry.
